title: Why are there bots in Twisted Treelines
body: Why. just why. like whats the point

replies.body:
0. Level many accounts at once with bots
0. Sell accounts to people who keep getting permabanned
0. Profit
Because they don't get banned for some reason.

Twisted Treeline is fast XP.

Or at least it used to be before the level 30 cap was removed. Now I don't know its state.
